name: Soul Control (ComputerCow)
description:
We recommend playing in fullscreen.

As a new recruit to hell's gates, you have to help guide souls to the afterlife. You can control one soul at a time, and it will obey you, but, while you're not controlling them, other souls will act on their own. Some will run in circles, some will jump in place, and some will chase skulls. You'll have to deal with these souls, and make sure you can still guide them all to the afterlife.

This was made for the 2020 GMTK game jam in collaboration with IDislikeNames.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move Soul

Tab/Numbers/Scroll: Switch Active Soul (you can also click a soul)

Enter/Click: Advance Text

WASD: Move Camera

Space: Reset Camera

Escape: Exit Game

Click the reset button in the top right to reset a level. Softlocks are common.
